story: In the sun-kissed pond, a little turtle named Terry loved to dance. She'd spin and twirl, her shell shimmering like jewels. The other pond creatures gathered to watch, mesmerized by her moves. A curious fish even tapped out the beat on a nearby rock. Terry's favorite song was the chatter of the frogs, and she'd leap with joy whenever they croaked in harmony. One day, she convinced the frogs to join her dance party. Together, they created a symphony of splash and song, filling the pond with laughter and joy. And from that day on, Terry's dance parties became the toast of the pond, enticing all to join in the fun!
